refnamediv.refpurpose: Amanda Application to interface with native tar utility available on solaris platforms

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Amsuntar is an &A; Application API script. It should not be run by users directly. It uses Solaris bundled tar utility to backup and restore data. Currenty ACLs from ZFS file system can only be backed up using the solaris supplied tar utility.

refsect1.title: PROPERTIES
refsect1.para: This section lists the properties that control amsuntar's functionality. See amanda-applications7 for information on application properties and how they are configured.

varlistentry.listitem: Optional tar read or write block size. The default is set when &A; is built to 256.
Include extended attributes in archive. The default is set when &A; is built to YES.

Write tar file with extended headers. With this optiion the modification time is maintained with a granularity of microseconds,Long file names and file sizes greater than 8GB can be archived. The default is set when &A; is built to YES.
